headline: At Vance rally, Marjorie Taylor Greene calls vax mandates 'worst thing that has ever happened to America'
author: Scott Wartman
sentences: DEERFIELD TOWNSHIP, Ohio – COVID-19 vaccine mandates are the "worst thing that has ever happened in America," U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., told a crowd in a suburban hotel just north of Cincinnati.
The Biden administration last week dropped its plans to enforce a vaccine-or-test mandate for employers with 100 or more workers, in light of a U.S. Supreme Court ruling against that mandate.
